Player History
Drafted in 18th round, 287th overall pick, by Boston in 2015...
Drafted in Rule 5 Draft, 1st round, by Cincinnati in 2016...
Earned first career win on 8/10/2016...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 2019...
1/31/2020: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,931,429 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 4/17/2020 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 2020...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,931,429 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 3/31/2021 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 8 weeks...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,931,429 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 6/1/2022 with a Inflamed Bicep Tendon, out for 2-3 weeks...
10/12/2022: Signed a contract extension with Cincinnati, $11,000,000 per year, for 4 years.
Traded from Cincinnati to Colorado on 2/3/2024 (Going to COL: 1B Estanis Aguilar, P Bob Largent, CF Jose Gula, P Pablo Martinez, C John Smith. Going to CIN: P Vinny Rivera, P Rick Adamski)...
Injured on 8/7/2024 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Was selected to the 2025 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/7/2027 to a 3-year deal worth $2,250,000 per year...
Injured on 5/16/2027 with a Fractured Elbow, out for 8 weeks...
